title: Increased sea levels cause habitat loss

content.question: Which of the following is a possible effect of global climate change as illustrated in Scenario 1 ?

choices.label: Increased sea level would reduce the size of the habitat patches.
Increased carbon dioxide availability spurs plant growth, which would increase habitat size.
Decreased temperatures would cause unsuitable abiotic conditions.
Decreased precipitation would eliminate habitat patches.

content.answer: Increased sea level would reduce the size of the habitat patches.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
